alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Northern Carroll; Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll; Southern Coos; Strafford; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 3:36PM EST until January 17 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTRY MIX SLOWLY EXITS TONIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow and sleet accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and western Maine. Portions of central, northern, and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until Midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible due to icy road conditions. Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
